mapper.insert: insert into member_t(memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberEmail) values (#{memberId},#{memberPassword},#{memberName},#{memberEmail})
mapper.select: select * from member_t where memberId = #{memberId} and memberPassword = #{memberPassword}
select * from member_t where m_id = #{m_id} and memberPassword = #{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_t set memberName = #{memberName}, memberEmail = #{memberEmail} where m_id = #{m_id}
